<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
        //var nome_banco = "nome_banco";
  
        //get values
        var nomes_banco = FormUtil.getValues("nome_banco");
        var length = $('select[name= "nome_banco"] option').length;
        
        if(length === 2){
            $('[name = "nome_banco"]').find('option').get(0).remove();
        }
        //console.log("Length: " + length);
    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).change(function(){
        //Flag para reencaminhar para o processo
        window.sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", "importar");
        window.sessionStorage.setItem("nwf", $("input#n_wf_banco").val());
        window.sessionStorage.setItem("servico", "lea");
    });
</script>
